title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, the file is not closed.
EB: It should close the file f1.txt as no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 
2. Close all editors. 
3. Create a new file f1.txt. 
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
